description: If disabled, the game will remain in 16:9.
name: 4:3 Aspect Ratio

description: If enabled, it keeps the 4:3 ratio when transitioning to the full-drawn section.
name: Keep 4:3

description: Changes the health bar colors in the SMB1 section of Bit-Beat
name: SMB1 Health Bar Colors

description: When disabled, the health bar remains the same when transitioning to the full-drawn section.
name: Change Health Bar Color

description: Changes the time bar colors in Bit-Beat
name: Time Bar Colors

description: If the LBM Sticker Set is enabled and whose stickers are used. (P-Slice Only)
name: LBM Sticker Set
